item.title: 微软在网络拉网行动中查获与勒索软件有关的域名
item.description: 热图详细显示了 Lumma 恶意软件在全球的传播情况以及在 Windows 设备上的遭遇情况。【原文：Heat map detailing global spread of Lumma malware infections and encounters across Windows devices.】

item.title: 拉各斯初创企业吸引的资金增加了 42%，逆转了非洲经济放缓的趋势
item.description: 由于 Flutterwave Inc. 和 Interswitch Ltd. 等企业的出现，尼日利亚商业中心拉各斯的初创企业去年吸引的投资增加了 42%，展示了该市作为新企业中心的吸引力。【原文：Startups in Nigeria’s commercial hub of Lagos attracted 42% more investment last year, as the presence of businesses such as Flutterwave Inc. and Interswitch Ltd. showcased the city’s appeal as a hub for new enterprises.】

item.title: LMArena 从学术项目到价值 6 亿美元的初创公司
item.description:
一项始于加州大学伯克利分校、旨在为人工智能模型排序的努力已经从包括安德森-霍洛维茨（Andreessen Horowitz）在内的投资者那里筹集到了 1 亿美元。【原文：

An effort that began at UC Berkeley as a way to rank AI models has raised $100 million from investors including Andreessen Horowitz. 

】

item.title: LVMH 集团被指警告中国困境将导致奢侈品市场持续疲软
item.description: 据知情人士透露，奢侈品集团路威酩轩集团（LVMH）今年前三个月的收入未达预期，因此该集团警告投资者和分析师，需求依然疲软。【原文：LVMH is warning investors and analysts that demand remains soft after the luxury conglomerate missed revenue estimates for the first three months of the year, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 大豆减税政策结束，米莱（Milei）在为农民解困的努力中磕磕绊绊
item.description: 在决定将大豆出口税提高约七个百分点之后，哈维尔-米莱伊总统释放阿根廷陷入困境的农民的誓言开始动摇。【原文：President Javier Milei’s vow to unleash Argentina’s beleaguered farmers is faltering after a decision to raise taxes on soy exports by about seven percentage points.】

item.title: 财报发布后，Palo Alto 跌至一年来最低点
item.description: Palo Alto Networks 公司周三短暂下跌至一年多来的最低点，一天前这家网络安全公司发布的展望未能完全缓解对增长的担忧。【原文：Palo Alto Networks Inc. briefly tumbled to its lowest in more than a year on Wednesday, a day after the cybersecurity company gave an outlook that failed to fully ease growth concerns.】

item.title: X 发布假总统死讯后，坦桑尼亚关闭了互联网
item.description: X 社交网络平台上的多个政府账户被入侵后，坦桑尼亚限制了互联网访问。【原文：Tanzania restricted internet access after several government accounts on the X social network platform were compromised.】

item.title: 围绕美国法规的乐观情绪使比特币升至创纪录水平
item.description: 在美国推进稳定币立法后，比特币创下了历史新高，这激起了人们对唐纳德-特朗普总统领导下的监管明朗化的希望。【原文：Bitcoin hit an all-time high after the advancement of stablecoin legislation in the US stoked hopes of regulatory clarity under President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 安大略省将斥资 22 亿美元加强土著居民在采矿业中的作用
item.description: 安大略省政府将斥资近 31 亿加元（22 亿美元）鼓励原住民参与采矿业，以期在这个加拿大人口最多的省份提高关键矿物的产量。【原文：The Ontario government will spend nearly C$3.1 billion ($2.2 billion) to encourage Indigenous participation in the mining industry, in a bid to ramp up critical minerals production across Canada’s most populous province.】

item.title: 太空初创公司 Iceye 加大波兰投资以满足军队需求
item.description: 芬兰先进对地观测卫星制造商 Iceye Oy 公司计划在波兰进一步投资，因为该公司看到希望提高太空情报收集能力的国家的需求在增加。【原文：Iceye Oy, the Finnish maker of advanced Earth-observation satellites, plans further investments in Poland as it sees increased demand from countries that want to improve their intelligence-gathering capabilities in space.】

item.title: 去全球化对债券市场的威胁
item.description:
通货膨胀的完美秘诀。【原文：

A perfect recipe for inflation.

】

item.title: 利比亚燃料进口欠款高达 10 亿美元，供应面临风险
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士称，利比亚在大约三个月前结束了一项有争议的石油易货贸易计划后，拖欠其燃料供应商的款项已高达约 10 亿美元。【原文：Libya has piled up about $1 billion of arrears to its fuel suppliers after the country ended a controversial oil barter program about three months ago, according to people familiar with the matter】

item.title: 杰富瑞在新兴市场招聘员工以促进销售和交易
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团公司（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：Jefferies Financial Group Inc. is hiring industry veterans to bolster its emerging markets team after several high-profile traders and salespeople left in a shakeup earlier this year.】

item.title: 跨越关键点位后加拿大股市有望进一步上涨
item.description: 投资者和市场观察人士预计，加拿大股市将进一步走高，此前主要股票基准指数已连续 10 天上涨，并于周二首次收于关键门槛之上。【原文：Investors and market-watchers expect Canadian stocks to gain further after a major stock benchmark rode a 10-day winning streak to close above a key threshold on Tuesday, for the first time.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数延续跌势，目标公司因宏观压力下调前景展望
item.description: 美国股市周三下跌，原因是不断攀升的债券收益率继续对风险资产构成压力，而消费风向标塔吉特公司（Target Corp.【原文：US equities fell on Wednesday as climbing bond yields continued to pressure risk assets and consumer bellwether Target Corp. slashed its sales outlook, citing tariffs and economic turbulence.】

item.title: 对冲基金 EDL 31% 的收益掩盖了对美股的痛苦空头押注
item.description: 宏观对冲基金资深人士爱德华-德-朗格拉德（Edouard de Langlade）正处于他二十多年职业生涯中最好的交易期，他说，看跌美股的赌注让他很痛苦。但他还是在做空美股。【原文：Macro hedge fund veteran Edouard de Langlade, who is in the middle of the best trading period of his more-than two decade career, says bearish wagers on US stocks have been painful. He is shorting them anyway.】

item.title: Natixis 为 15 亿美元私人信贷基金寻找合作伙伴
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，法国 Natixis SA 公司正在商谈设立一个规模约为 15 亿美元的直接借贷基金，这将使该公司能够购买这类资产。【原文：France’s Natixis SA is in talks to set up a direct lending fund of around $1.5 billion, which would allow it to buy into the asset class, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 情书、深夜冰激凌：查尔特如何最终征服考克斯
item.description: 今年迄今为止最大的一笔交易始于情人节前后的一封情书。【原文：One of the biggest deals of the year so far started around Valentine’s Day, with a love letter.】

item.title: 埃利奥特将在代理权争夺战中赢得两个菲利普斯 66 董事会席位
item.description: 菲利普斯 66 公司的股东将选举埃利奥特投资管理公司提名的两名董事，这是该激进投资者在美国进行的首次代理投票。【原文：Phillips 66 shareholders are set to elect two of Elliott Investment Management’s nominees to its board, in the first ever US proxy vote for the activist investor.】

item.title: 沙特航空公司 Flynas 将首次公开募股价格定在区间上限
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯 Flynas 公司将其首次公开发行股票的价格定在了区间的高端，这表明随着全球市场动荡的缓解，海湾地区的上市需求仍在持续。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Flynas Co. set the price for its initial public offering at the top end of the range, showing continued demand for Gulf listings as global market turmoil eases.】

item.title: 制糖业一直在躲避小肯尼迪的健康运动— 直到现在
item.description: 食糖生产商以为他们逃过了小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.【原文：Sugar producers thought they had escaped Robert F. Kennedy Jr.’s Make America Healthy Again agenda.】

item.title: 摩托罗拉解决方案公司接近以 45 亿美元收购无线电制造商 Silvus
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩托罗拉解决方案公司（Motorola Solutions Inc.【原文：Motorola Solutions Inc. is in advanced talks to acquire closely held wireless-radio maker Silvus Technologies for around $4.5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 梅洛尼期待穆迪最终结束意大利濒临破产的状态
item.description: 还有两天，意大利就有机会摆脱笼罩在乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）首相头衔上的近乎垃圾的地位。【原文：Italy is just two days away from the chance to start shaking off the near-junk status that has hung over Giorgia Meloni’s premiership.】

item.title: 比亚迪在欧洲推出售价 2.3 万欧元的掀背车，争夺更便宜的电动车市场
item.description: 比亚迪公司（BYD Co., Ltd.）在欧洲推出了 Dolphin Surf，这是一款全电动掀背车，售价不到 23,000 欧元（约合 26,100 美元）。【原文：BYD Co. is raising the stakes in Europe’s race for cheaper electric vehicles with the European launch of the Dolphin Surf, a fully-electric hatchback that will sell for less than €23,000 ($26,100).】

item.title: 雪佛龙在安哥拉平台火灾后搜寻失踪工人
item.description: 安哥拉一个深水石油平台发生火灾后，雪佛龙公司和当地政府正在寻找一名失踪的工人。【原文：Chevron Corp. and local authorities in Angola are searching for a missing worker after a fire broke out on a deep water oil platform.】

item.title: 南非最新预算尝试中的赢家和输家
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）周三在开普敦向立法者提交了第三版国家预算，此前数月一直在为增税问题争论不休。【原文：South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana presented a third version of the national budget to lawmakers in Cape Town on Wednesday after months of wrangling over tax increases.】

item.title: 南非财政部长修改后的预算要点
item.description: 以下是南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）周三在开普敦宣布的南非 2025 年第三版预算的要点，此前两版预算因执政联盟内部在税收问题上存在分歧而被撤回。【原文：Below are the highlights of South Africa’s third iteration of the 2025 budget announced by Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana in Cape Town on Wednesday, after two previous versions were withdrawn because of disagreements within the governing coalition over taxes.】

item.title: 并非每支球队都值得制作 Netflix 体育纪录片
item.description:
客户对它们爱不释手，但流媒体用户在答应什么方面却越来越挑剔。【原文：

Customers love them, but streamers are getting choosier in what they say yes to.

】

item.title: 米莱的削减让阿根廷人开上了挂纸牌的新车
item.description: 玛丽拉-梅勒赫（Mariela Mailhe）在阿根廷最繁华的街区之一销售进口汽车。这些汽车配备电子调节真皮座椅和全景天窗，但部分由于哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）的紧缩政策，这些汽车都是挂着纸质车牌从停车场开出来的。【原文：Mariela Mailhe sells imported cars in one of Argentina’s flashiest neighborhoods. They come with electronically adjustable leather seats and panoramic sunroofs, but thanks in part to Javier Milei’s austerity campaign they roll off the lot with paper license plates.】

item.title: 卡塔尔在波音巨型飞机交易后表示未来有望订购空客喷气机
item.description: 卡塔尔航空公司（Qatar Airways）在宣布向波音公司（Boeing Co., Ltd.）订购大型远程喷气式飞机几天后表示，未来仍有可能向空中客车公司（Airbus SE）购买宽体飞机。【原文：Qatar Airways said it could still buy widebody aircraft from Airbus SE in the future, days after it announced a mega order for long-haul jets by Boeing Co.】
